hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9357859d74dbe13de4673153117b52a8.png)

We can use subtraction to find the missing whole: $\pink\Box - \green7 = \blue2$

We can also add all of the frogs together:  $\green7 + \blue2 = \pink{\Box}$

question.content:
Some frogs were dancing on a log. $7$ frogs jumped into the pond. There were $2$ frogs left on the log.

**How many frogs were dancing on the log in the beginning? **

[[☃ input-number 1]]  frogs
